string_data:
PRIMARY: Two Just Stop Oil protesters, Jennifer Kowalski (28) and Cole Macdonald (22), are accused of using angle grinders to breach Stansted Airport's fence and spraying two planes with orange paint using fire extinguishers. They accessed the airport at 5:00 AM on June 20th, causing an estimated Â£52,000 in cleanup costs. Both have pleaded not guilty to criminal damage and interfering with national infrastructure.

SECONDARY: No secondary protest actions mentioned.

OTHER FOCAL: The court proceedings are ongoing, with the case adjourned until August 15th and both defendants released on conditional bail.

TONE: The article maintains a neutral, factual tone focused on reporting the legal proceedings without editorial commentary on the protest action.
